backend/main.mo: Defines the canister actor and a large set of public Motoko types for users, hotels, bookings, payments, reviews, stays, visibility, and authorization-related structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for many frontend source files, describing their functionality and purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global style definitions including light/dark OKLCH color tokens and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, PWA manifest links, icons, and mounting the React root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display properties.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling versioned caching, install/activate cleanup, navigation fallback, and network‑first static asset caching.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Comprehensive pre‑publish regression checklist covering routing, auth, diagnostics, booking flows, and admin/non-admin behaviors.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app setup configuring routing, React Query, theming, identity provider, and service worker cleanup on startup.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Generates build version and timestamp using environment variables or a fallback timestamp.
frontend/src/components/account/AccountS: Panel showing Internet Identity status, build version, and optional admin diagnostics with refresh and copy actions.
frontend/src/components/account/AdminRec: Admin-only card for resetting admin access using a recovery token.
frontend/src/components/account/PrePubli: Warning card listing required features and checks before publishing the release.
frontend/src/components/account/Publishi: UI card with accordion-based instructions for deployment, troubleshooting failures, and fixing UI cache issues.
frontend/src/components/account/Troubles: Provides buttons and dialogs to reset React Query cache, clear service workers, and wipe browser caches for troubleshooting.
frontend/src/components/admin/NextStepSe: Card allowing admins to select and persist a preferred next development feature via a radio-group interface.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResetAdmin: Form and dialog for restoring admin access using a token, including error handling, sanitization, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component displaying the current year and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with navigation, language switcher, auth-aware links, and admin/ hotel area controls.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper combining header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity auth flow and clearing cached queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireActo: Gate component that shows loading, errors, or warnings based on backend actor readiness before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper requiring Internet Identity login, showing loading or login prompt until a user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/bookings/AdminBo: Displays all system bookings with status counts, loading/error handling, and scrollable booking cards.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Reusable date picker field with validation support, popover calendar, and optional minimum date restriction.
Shows manual payment instructions for a booking, including copyable booking details and step-by-step guidance.
Dialog for submitting a new booking request with form validation, date selection, room choice, and payment instructions flow.
frontend/src/components/bookings/GuestBo: Lists a guest's bookings with refresh, cancel actions, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/bookings/HotelBo: Displays hotel-specific bookings with actions to confirm, reject, cancel, or delete, plus full loading/error handling.
frontend/src/components/common/PanelErro: React error boundary that catches rendering errors in panels and displays a retryable error card.
frontend/src/components/diagnostics/Rout: UI card that diagnoses route loading errors, shows replica rejection details, and provides retry, copy, and troubleshooting actions.
frontend/src/components/hotel/AdminHotel: Admin panel for viewing, generating, copying, and managing hotel invite tokens with loading and error states.
Admin interface to view and modify hotel visibility, dummy status, and payment status with action controls and error handling.
frontend/src/components/hotel/GuestHotel: Dialog displaying a hotel's room listings, photos, pricing, and optional payment instructions in a scrollable layout.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelInvit: Access gate requiring users to enter and validate a hotel invite token before accessing restricted hotel features.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Form component for viewing and editing hotel profile details, including name, classification, address, logo, map link, and payment instructions.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelRooms: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of hotel room inventory with image uploads, pricing, and promos.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Form for recording a guest stay by submitting principal ID and check‑in/out dates to the backend.
frontend/src/components/payments/AdminPa: Admin panel to view all payments and confirm or reject them with status badges and error handling.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Displays step‑by‑step payment instructions based on selected method along with reference and amount details.
Selector component allowing users to choose a payment method from PayPal, DANA, or GoPay.
frontend/src/components/profile/Principa: Shows the user's principal ID and provides a button to copy it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Renders a profile setup dialog that auto-opens for new users and allows submitting name and email to save a profile.
frontend/src/components/reviews/ReviewsL: Displays reviews for a target with loading, error, empty, and list states, including average rating and refresh support.
frontend/src/components/reviews/ReviewSu: Provides a form to submit a star rating and optional comment for a target entity, handling validation, submission, and errors.
frontend/src/components/reviews/StarRati: Shows interactive or read‑only star rating buttons with configurable size.
frontend/src/components/stays/StayHistor: Fetches and displays the user's stay history with loading, error, empty, and refresh states.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccountStatus.ts: React Query hook that fetches the authenticated user's account status, scoped by principal ID and exposing loading and refetch states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorSafe.ts: Builds a backend actor with timeouts, health checks, optional access control init, and exposes readiness, errors, and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPayments.ts: Fetches all payment requests and provides mutations to confirm or reject them with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRecoveryDiagn: Retrieves admin recovery diagnostics scoped by principal with controlled querying and state exposure.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminReset.ts: Restores admin access using a token and invalidates all related admin and diagnostics queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendTestingMode: Queries backend testing-mode status with timeout protection and loading handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Creates bookings with detailed error normalization and fetches guest booking lists with principal-scoped cache keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useBrowseHotels.ts: Fetches hotel lists (all, with principals, or by country) using a safe actor and returns loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Gets current user profile, role, and admin status with principal-scoped caching and stable admin UI logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useHotelAccess.ts: Determines if a user can access hotel features based on invite or admin status and returns unified access flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useHotelInvites.ts: Checks invite status, consumes and generates invite tokens, and fetches all invite tokens with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useHotelProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save a user's hotel profile with react‑query, handling caching, timeouts, and optimistic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useHotelVisibilityAdm: Admin hooks to fetch all hotel visibility stats and mutate hotel visibility or payment status with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and exposing identity state to components.
frontend/src/hooks/useNextStep.ts: Stores and retrieves a per‑user roadmap next‑step selection using localStorage scoped by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentRequest.ts: Hooks to create payment requests, fetch a payment request, and determine subscription status via actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useReviews.ts: Hooks to submit reviews and fetch reviews by target or all reviews, with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomInventory.ts: Hooks to update or delete room inventory for a hotel and invalidate related hotel data caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useStayHistory.ts: Provides hooks to fetch a user’s stay history and create new stay records with appropriate cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestingMode.ts: Manages a persisted local testing‑mode flag that toggles visibility of dummy hotels.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Defines a lightweight i18n system with English and Indonesian dictionaries and localStorage‑based language persistence.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides a language context with methods to change language and translate keys using stored preferences.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles, color variables, typography rules, and iOS-specific layout fixes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a helper function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for merging class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Renders the account status view with admin-only troubleshooting, deployment help, and recovery sections.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard with actor verification, watchdog timeout handling, and multiple admin management panels.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotels.tsx: Displays hotel listings with filtering, testing mode logic, and error handling using backend-driven data.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Renders the guest account page with profile, bookings, stays, reviews, and hotel selection, handling loading and profile fetch errors.
frontend/src/pages/GuestArea.tsx: Provides the guest landing area with navigation to browsing, account, status, and hotel-area options, showing identity info when logged in.
frontend/src/pages/HotelArea.tsx: Implements hotel management area with access checks, profile setup, subscription status, bookings, rooms, and reviews, handling loading and errors.
frontend/src/pwa/cleanupServiceWorker.ts: Unregisters service workers and clears caches once per version to fix stale SW issues, marking cleanup completion in localStorage.
frontend/src/pwa/registerSW.ts: Registers the service worker, tracks updates, and dispatches events when new SW versions are available, avoiding duplicate prompts.
frontend/src/pwa/SwUpdatePrompt.tsx: Empty file placeholder for service worker update prompt UI.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats numeric amounts into localized currency strings based on RoomCurrency.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Normalizes unknown errors into readable user-facing messages with special handling for replica, timeout, validation, and internal errors.
frontend/src/utils/replicaRejection.ts: Analyzes error messages to detect replica rejection and stopped canister cases, extracting canister IDs and generating user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting with a custom error if it doesn't resolve in time.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requirements, known issues, and pending revisions for the app state.
